Text:
Seed guys.  Help seed.  I can't do it on my own.  

From the 15 - 25 people that have the full copies, I only see 0 -2 seeders on (with 1 being me).  

Sacrafice other torrents and upload these valuable and informational vids.

Davethenave has left us to fend for ourselves and most probably won't upload anymore (he left disk 7 at 47% and disk 8 at 6%)...

I am growing weary of uploading constantly. I've been uploading since June. So, I'll be stopping my seeding of this series (disk 1 - 6) on September 31st. Seriously, no one seeds here. I think there was a time when I saw like 2 other seeders...for like half a week.

Well, anyway, just wanted to inform you...so make sure you put as much priority into these torrents.

As of Feb 7 2007


I see 201.221.157.146 has 20% of this file


I'm doing my part to fill in missing parts. Then I'll upload the rest of the 25 set mp4 files.


Help me.


After you get a complete file leave it on for share.
Dave are you teaching in Thailand?

I kept on seeding them even I after I posted. Not as much but I would seed.

Anyway, now that DavetheNave is back, I'll try to seed as much as possible. Though I have a lot of catching up to do since all the new discs (9 - 18, sans 17) are at 0 %.....but I should get those in time.

Good luck all in getting these files and please seed as much as possible. I've even increased my upload speed and am paying around $100 a month just so I could seed these files better.

Help keep the help going.

All who  seed this series of 25 disk. It's a long list and large files.

I'm asking your help. 

Please... After you complete a download Leave it to seed until a couple more people can take your place.

I've tried off and on for more than a year to make this teaching course available.

This is my last run. 

I'll be off the net in a couple of weeks. 

It's up to you whether these torrents live or die.

BEFORE you put down money for any TEFL / TESOL course take 3 minutes to download and read:
